name: Legends of Arc: The Slicer
description:
Submission for /vrpg/ Game Jam 8.5. Theme: Pizza
Join Three Adventurers, hired by the Church of Arcos to acquire the rare artifact known as "The Slicer".

RPG MAKER 2000 RTP Required to Play!

It has not fully been tested, but I managed to complete   it in 8 hours. No time to do really any custom graphics or anything, so its just a rather linear simple RM2K game. Two possible endings, and there are a couple choices you can make that may affect the ending you get, as well as the difficulty of the game. Be sure to examine things if you want to go for both endings.
